Zamanın eskitemediği bir oyun aradım ve cidden en uygun seçim olarak gözüme Portal 2 göründü. Hala da sıkılmadan oynadığım oyunlardan, Valve'in (Valve bir zamanlar oyun yapıyordu :) ) elinden çıkmış bir başyapıt. Bulmaca çözmeyi sevenler için biçilmiş kaftan! Grafikler hala çok hoş duruyor ya da bana öyle geliyor. Oyundaki esprilere hala gülüyorum. Arada bir bu oyuna dönüp oynuyorum, kütüphanenize ekleyin pişman olmazsınız.

이 세상이 망기전엔 나오리라 믿으며..

Игра просто шедевр! Можно играть весь день если любишь головоломки)) Особенно понравилось совместное прохождение это круто! Ты играешь с другом и не паришься если ты не до думываешь что-то друг до деловает!) Кароч, советую поиграть!))

If you loved Portal, you'll definitely love Portal 2. You don't need to have played Portal to play and understand Portal 2, but it definitely adds to the experience, the jokes, and the amusement factor. This one's definitely longer to play through, and just like the original, it has tons of replay value. It also has an amazing online co-op mode, which is tons of fun with a friend, and that has great replay value as well!

Mesmo que eu tenha me sentido tonto e com vontade de vomitar em alguns momentos do jogo, ele é muito bom em todos os aspectos. 
Uma ótima opção para quem gosta de puzzles, seguindo a essência do primeiro game da franquia.

Melhor jogo da valve até agora.

在考虑奖项提名的时候，本来想投票给“厉害了我的哥”，后来转念一想，还是投给了“最需要抱抱的反派”
为什么?
因为我连dota2的播报员都是GlaDOS[滑稽]
充满转折的正传，友好协作的双人关卡，全都完成了还有创意工坊内其他玩家制作的关卡，跟求生一样都是可以玩上成百上千小时的游戏，值得买买买！

游戏发售时我在上高中，那时候还没接触steam。从网上下载下这游戏的盗版后，玩了几关就过不去了，于是就烂尾删了游戏。大学时买了正版，没想到很轻松的就通关了，难道过了几年智商差距这么大？
通关后意犹未尽，总觉得还没玩够。我给几个朋友玩了下这游戏，有的玩的迷迷糊糊不知怎么办，有的玩的很顺利。
总之我是为了得徽章才写评测的，啊啊啊！不编了，总之，好游戏，期待续作！

文句がなさすぎる。
HL2系ゲームである故にグラフィックもとても良い。
グラフィックが良いだけでなく、やはりこれもHL2系ゲームの恩恵として、とても動作が軽い。
パズルゲームとしてのパズルといてますよ感とパズル解けた後の爽快感が良いし、だんだん色んな要素が加わって難しくなっていく感じも、ストーリーがあるのも良い。
アクションゲームの要素もあるし、FPSゲームの要素もあるから、色んなゲームの要素が入っているのに、それでもパズルゲームとしてちゃんとしているのも楽しいし良い。

Portal 2 is an experience everyone really has to at least try. It isn't for everyone, but you'd better hope you like it because otherwise your friends will forever consider you not as smart as them.

Pros-

Incredibly innovative mechanics
Incredibly engaging puzzles
Incredibly hilarious dialogue
Less cake, but more potatoes and lemons
Only the finest in robot choirs
The most inanimate companion since Wilson
Spaaaaaaaace
Lots of waiting for sequels for a very long time without a comparable substitute
A nice wheat field
A wonderful absence of jerks in the community
Like 2 minutes of falling down a shaft
All the elevator rides downward you could ever want, and then, like, 50 more
The glory of being an astronaut, Olympian or war hero
A nice break from sobbing about lesser disappointments in life *Cough cough No Mans Sky Cough*
The finest in cough medicine
All the enlightened education you could ever receive from a Useless Facts Core
Trick shot-ing the clipboard into the toilet from across the room in the beginning of the game
Watching speed runs where the game is completed in less than an hour and then picking your jaw off the ground
The joy of telling your friend exactly what to do and then getting frustrated when they do it wrong
Knowing you're playing a game with no cons

Cons-
...
Chyba pora sobie odświerzyć ten tytuł :) Zobaczymy czy nadal ma tak dobre zdanie o nim :)
